name: Heroes and Test of Succubus
description:
All characters are eighteen years old or above.

[Gameplay]
This is a role-playing game exploring a dungeon with a single storyline.


Hero: Lou
Lou is the main character of this game.
You will see him grow through his adventure.


Knight :Priscilla
Priscilla is a knight who loves cute things.
She is dedicated to her mission.
But she cannot get her eyes off Lou.


Scholar: Nina
Nina is a scholar.
She is a little hostile to Lou.
But that's only because she care so much.


[System]
- High-quality pixelated art of monsters etc.
- Skippable dialogues
- Simple turn-based combat system
- Auto-dash
